channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FBI makes arrest in investigation into pipe bombs placed in DC on eve of Jan. 6 riot, AP source says
item.description: The FBI has made an arrest in its nearly 5-year-old investigation into who placed pipe bombs in Washington before the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. Capitol.

item.title: A quiet corner of Arkansas has become a hot spot for US immigration crackdown, AP finds
President Trump’s contempt shocks the country’s largest Somali community
